attributes.action: campaign for an international war crimes investigation in Gaza for the acts committed by israeli defence force personnel against civilians.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to ask the PM Gordon Brown to call upon the international community to conduct an international war crimes investigation in Gaza for the extreme acts committed by israeli defence force personnel against civilians and that the guilty parties are charged and brought to justice.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the International Criminal Court (ICC).
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
